${modID}:ExampleCard.NAME: Name
${modID}:ExampleCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This will automatically be used if the card is upgraded. Remove it if unneeded.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can put more text in here.
If you need to use it for stuff.
Blizzard is a good example for this.

${modID}:AetherDischarge_Warforged.NAME: Aether Discharge
${modID}:AetherDischarge_Warforged.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage X times to ALL enemies.
${modID}:AetherDischarge_Warforged.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage X + 1 times to ALL enemies.

${modID}:RaiseShields_Warforged.NAME: Raise Shields
${modID}:RaiseShields_Warforged.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Energy Shield 3 times. NL Dexterity affects this card.

${modID}:_BlockModifier.NAME: Cool Block Modifier
${modID}:_BlockModifier.DESCRIPTION: A cool block modifier that does things.

${modID}:EnergyShieldBlockModifier.NAME: Energy Shield
${modID}:EnergyShieldBlockModifier.DESCRIPTION: A powerful energy barrier that negates damage before #yBlock is applied.
